<font size="4">　　　　由于Ollama的exe安装软件双击安装的时候默认是在C盘，以及后续的模型数据下载也在C盘，导致会占用C盘空间，所以这里单独写了一个自定义安装Ollama安装目录的教程。</font><br>
<font size="4">　　Ollama官网地址：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://ollama.com/" target="_blank">https://ollama.com/</a></font><br>
<font size="4">　　这里有些朋友可能会遇到无法下载的问题，这里提供我下载好的软件包给大家</font><br>
<font size="4">　　百度网盘链接：<a rel="nofollow noopener" href="https://pan.baidu.com/s/1YuuD2t8R2WpAmcbLRWBoIA" target="_blank">https://pan.baidu.com/s/1YuuD2t8R2WpAmcbLRWBoIA</a><br>
　　提取码：d86m</font><ul><li><font size="5"><font color="#4169e1"><strong>手动创建Ollama安装目录</strong>　</font></font><br>
</li></ul>　　<font style="font-size:18px">首先在你想安装的路径下<strong><font color="#4169e1">创建好一个新文件夹，并把Ollama的安装包放在里面</font></strong>。比如我的是：E:\MySoftware\Ollama</font><font style="font-size:18px"><img id="aimg_xwG2n" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/fcD4x0TB8CsatoKUtkngQJ.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/fcD4x0TB8CsatoKUtkngQJ.png"><br>
</font><font style="font-size:18px"> 　　在文件路径上输入CMD回车后会自动打开命令窗口<br>
</font><font style="font-size:18px"><img id="aimg_Yx5Zj" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/RomsjjUwQ0oi5pMsIOkdmQ.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/RomsjjUwQ0oi5pMsIOkdmQ.png"><br>
</font><ul><li><font color="#3366ff"><font style="font-size:18pt"><strong>输入命令符安装 　　</strong></font></font><br>
</li></ul><font size="4">　　然后在CMD窗口输入：<strong><font color="#4169e1">OllamaSetup.exe /DIR=E:\MySoftware\Ollama</font></strong></font><br>
<font size="4"><font color="#4169e1">　　<strong>语法：软件名称 /DIR=这里放你上面创建好的Ollama指定目录</strong></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_GF2J2" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/NEag0Sehvbt7DbXASc6x1R.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/NEag0Sehvbt7DbXASc6x1R.png"><br>
<font size="4">　　然后Ollama就会进入安装，点击Install后，可以看到Ollama的安装路径就变成了我们指定的目录了，这样大模型数据包也会默认下载在指定目录中。</font><br>
<img id="aimg_hJ164" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/5oXs9D8KGlhWjXnlhge14Q.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/5oXs9D8KGlhWjXnlhge14Q.png"><br>
<img id="aimg_fC3c1" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/2zd86K2I4Dc1zu2D1bklQ0.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/2zd86K2I4Dc1zu2D1bklQ0.png"><br>
<font size="5"><font color="#4169e1">　　　　　　　　　　　　<strong>到这里Ollama自定义目录安装就完结了。</strong></font></font><br>
&nbsp;&nbsp;<font size="4">　　最后再讲个特例，就是有些小伙伴的Ollama已经安装在C盘了，但是又不想重新安装Ollama，只想把大模型资源包不要默认下载到C盘。</font><ul><li><font color="#3366ff"><font style="font-size:18pt"><strong>手动创建大模型存储目录</strong></font></font><br>
</li></ul><font size="4">　　首先先在你想要存储的盘符下创建好存储目录，比如我想存到E盘下面，我这里就创建了该目录：E:\MySoftware\Ollama</font><br>
<img id="aimg_C5NUC" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/E0gq0RrS9KoygQmVHiPoXd.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/E0gq0RrS9KoygQmVHiPoXd.png"><br>
<ul><li><strong><font size="5"><font color="#3366ff">增加环境变量</font></font></strong><br>
</li></ul><font size="4">　　然后鼠标右键我的电脑--&gt;属性--&gt;高级系统设置--&gt;环境变量</font><br>
<img id="aimg_LHEEH" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/9pWjXNlqbOyO9ouOaPL0gq.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/9pWjXNlqbOyO9ouOaPL0gq.png"><br>

 　<font size="4">　新建一个环境变量　　<strong><font color="#4169e1">OLLAMA_MODELS ：E:\MySoftware\Ollama\models</font></strong></font><br>
<img id="aimg_KNHNx" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/L9o3jQPzYZYZ7gpWPDA8p0.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/L9o3jQPzYZYZ7gpWPDA8p0.png"><ul><li><font color="#3366ff"><font style="font-size:18pt"><strong>复制转移大模型存储目录</strong></font></font><br>
</li></ul><font size="4">　　创建完环境变量后，把Ollama停止，然后进入C盘--&gt;用户--&gt;你自己的电脑名称--&gt;.ollama--&gt;复制整个models到刚刚上面新建的存储目录下。<strong><font color="#ff0000">复制完成后要删除C盘目录下的models文件夹。</font></strong></font><br>
<img id="aimg_xKyzK" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/i7aA6YUTa1NI7tN1KEW21p.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/i7aA6YUTa1NI7tN1KEW21p.png"><br>
<font size="4">　　复制到新创建的目录下</font><br>
<img id="aimg_x55OB" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://i.111666.best/image/Kv0Bkj80jwehLfWksw67Pn.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://i.111666.best/image/Kv0Bkj80jwehLfWksw67Pn.png"><br>
<font size="4">　　重启Ollama，打开CMD输入<strong><font color="#4169e1">Ollama list</font></strong>，查看大模型资源包是否能正常显示，显示正常则迁移完成，也可以直接和大模型进行提问，能回复说明也正常。</font><br>
